testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on Explore CTI for localization

substeps.message: Username: pushpendra.kumarjha@clarivate.com, Password: Cortellis@4321
Logged in with user: 'pushpendra.kumarjha@clarivate.com

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese
I click on Explore button
I click on CTI link

substeps.message: Explore LayoutLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

steps.title: I Verify Ch on "Explore.CTI"

substeps.message: On 'Explore.CTI' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'homepage.explore.link.clinicalTrialsLinkCTI' with the key 'homepage.explore.link.clinicalTrialsLinkCTI' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Clinical trials are NOT matching

On 'Explore.CTI' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'homepage.explore.image.title.clinicalTrialsLinkCTI' with the key 'homepage.explore.image.title.clinicalTrialsLinkCTI' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???? and the Content displayed on UI Clinical trials are NOT matching

On 'Explore.CTI' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'homepage.explore.image.description.clinicalTrialsLinkCTI' with the key 'homepage.explore.image.description.clinicalTrialsLinkCTI' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?????????? and the Content displayed on UI View all Clinical trials information are NOT matching

steps.title: I Verify China on "Explore.CTI"
